changeSet.author: ponomarev
changeSet.sql: create table ref_antifraud_rules_hunter ( id serial, code varchar(30), name varchar(200), isactive integer, txversion integer default 0, constraint pk_ref_antifraud_rules_hunter primary key (id) );

changeSet.author: ponomarev
changeSet.sql: create table ref_antifraud_rules_hunter_entities ( id serial, rules_hunter_id integer, ref_entity_id integer, txversion integer default 0, constraint fk_ref_af_rul_hunt_ent_r_af_rul_h foreign key (rules_hunter_id) references ref_antifraud_rules_hunter (id), constraint fk_ref_af_rul_hunt_ent_r_ref foreign key (ref_entity_id) references reference (id) );

changeSet.author: ponomarev

changeSet.author: ponomarev
changeSet.sql:
insert into ref_antifraud_rules_hunter_entities (rules_hunter_id, ref_entity_id) select (select id from ref_antifraud_rules_hunter where code = 'MA_SPAS_DPER'), (select id from reference where ref_header_id = 89 and code = 'MA') union select (select id from ref_antifraud_rules_hunter where code = 'MA_SPAS_DPER'), (select id from reference where ref_header_id = 89 and code = 'MA_PAS')
